Text: Can you speak up?
Notes: Responses when volume is off or low keeps looping till the player fixes volume

Text: Is something wrong?
Notes: Responses when volume is off or low keeps looping till the player fixes volume
Responses when volume is off or low keeps looping till the player fixes volume

Text: Hello...?
Notes: Response when volume is still low but increasing.

Text: Hey! I'm talking...
Notes: Response when volume is still low but increasing.

Text: Please? Will someone hear me?
Notes: Response when volume is still low but increasing.

Text: Maybe? You hear me! Actually... there's no way.
Notes: Response when volume is still low but increasing.

Text: I fixed it. Try speaking now.
Notes: Response that marks the end of checkpoint 1

Text: Everything's okay now.
Notes: Response that marks the end of checkpoint 2

Text: Why did you lower your own volume settings...?
Notes: Response that marks the end of checkpoint 3

Text: Oh! You can hear me... Ummm... well...
Notes: Responses trying to explain the problem without being covered by UI

Text: It's nice you can hear me but... what do I even say...
Notes: Responses trying to explain the problem without being covered by UI

Text: ...Umm... Oh god you're looking at me...
Notes: Responses trying to explain the problem without being covered by UI

Text: ....! Please don't...
Notes: Responses trying to explain the problem without being covered by UI

Text: ... Uh... Hi...? Oh no I made them mad...
Notes: Responses trying to explain the problem without being covered by UI

Text: Oh their UI is blocking me out!
Notes: Response to behing covered by the UI

Text: This is so much less nerve-wracking...
Notes: Response to behing covered by the UI

Text: Maybe they'll help me out?
Notes: Response to behing covered by the UI

Text: Help me better understand
Notes: Player response when the robot finishes this segment.

Text: Let's figure out what needs repairing'.
Notes: Player response when the robot finishes this segment.

Text: Go on... just tell me what's wrong.
Notes: Player response when the robot finishes this segment. Only available if UI covering the robot

Text: Well everything is just so much darker than I expected... Out here in the real world I mean.
Notes: Responses when covered by UI in the third phase

Text: There's just so much darkness everywhere!
Notes: Responses when covered by UI in the third phase

Text: I thought there'd be more light...
Notes: Responses when covered by UI in the third phase

Text: Maybe some more blues?
Notes: Responses when covered by UI in the third phase

Text: Is the world just that scary?
Notes: Responses when covered by UI in the third phase

Text: ... Well.... dark?
Notes: Responses not covered by UI in the third phase.

Text: ...Ummm.. how do I put this...
Notes: Responses not covered by UI in the third phase.

Text: ...Why is everything so miserable...
Notes: Responses not covered by UI in the third phase.

Text: ...Is it like this all the time?
Notes: Responses not covered by UI in the third phase.

Text: ...darkness...stress...
Notes: Responses not covered by UI in the third phase.

Text: Things are just like that all the time.
Notes: Response at the end of third phase.

Text: Well things are better sometimes.
Notes: Response at the end of the third phase.

Text: The world is definitely more fun! Just look around!
Notes: Response at the end of the third phase after fixing brightness and color grading.

Text: Thanks doc! Everything looks so much better.
Notes: Response if player fixed all the problems.

Text: Oh! It's... better!
Notes: Response if player fixed brightness/color but not covering the patient.

Text: ...How do you deal with it?
Notes: Response if the player only fixed the volume.

Text: We all deal with it. Life is just dark.
Notes: Response the player can choose if they only fixed volume.

Text: Life can be happy even in the state it's in.
Notes: Response the player can choose if they only fixed volume.

Text: The world is as it is. Nothing we can do about it.
Notes: Response the player can choose if they only fixed volume.

Text: It's okay. Things are much brighter now.
Notes: Response the player can choose if they fixed brightness/color but not covering the patient.

Text: Go on and enjoy those colors.
Notes: Response the player can choose if they fixed brightness/color but not covering the patient.

Text: Now you can see better. Everything should be fine.
Notes: Response the player can choose if they fixed brightness/color but not covering the patient.

Text: All the physical problems are repaired. But to fully heal you need to be yourself.
Notes: Response if the player fixed everything

Text: Don't worry. Everything's fine now. I believe in you little buddy.
Notes: Response if the player fixed everything

Text: Come on now! Things are all good. Good luck out there kiddo.
Notes: Response if the player fixed everything
